verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I saw the cleansing fountain, Open wide for all my sin, I obeyed the Spirit’s wooing When He said, Wilt thou be clean?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I will praise Him! I will praise Him! Praise the Lamb for sinners slain; Give Him glory, all ye people, For His blood can wash away each stain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' the way seems straight and narrow, All I claimed was swept away; My ambitions, plans, and wishes, At my feet in ashes lay.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Then God’s fire upon the altar Of my heart was set aflame; I shall never cease to praise Him, Glory, glory to His name!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blessèd be the name of Jesus! I’m so glad He took me in; He’s forgiven my transgressions, He has cleansed my heart from sin.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Glory, glory to the Father! Glory, glory to the Son! Glory, glory to the Spirit! Glory to the Three in One!
